Actions.Name: Add a person face
Actions.Description: Add a representative face to a person for identification.

Actions.Name: Create a face list
Actions.Description: Create an empty face list with user-specified faceListId, name and an optional userData.

Actions.Name: Create a person
Actions.Description: Create a new person in a specified person group.

Actions.Name: Create a person group
Actions.Description: Create a new person group with specified personGroupId, name and user-provided userData.

Actions.Name: Detect faces
Actions.Description: Detect human faces in an image and returns face locations, and optionally with faceIds, landmarks, and attributes.

Actions.Name: Get a face list
Actions.Description: Retrieve a face list's information, including faceListId, name, userData and faces in the face list.

Actions.Name: Get a person
Actions.Description: Retrieve a person's information, including registered persisted faces, name and userData.

Actions.Name: Get a person face
Actions.Description: Retrieve information about a persisted face specified by persistedFaceId, personId and its belonging personGroupId.

Actions.Name: Get a person group
Actions.Description: Retrieve the information of a person group, including its name and userData.

Actions.Name: Find person from face
Actions.Description: Verify whether two faces belong to a same person or whether one face belongs to a person.
